title: Check for a Balanced Equation
text: Check if the equation is balanced or not. If not, balance the equation.

title: Calculate the Molar Amount of $$C_8 H_{18}$$
text: Use the equation $$\text{Moles of Reactant A} = \frac{\text{Mass of Reactant A}}{\text{Molar Mass of Reactant A}}$$.

title: Calculate the Molar Amount of $$C_8 H_{18}$$
text: What is $$702 \text{ g } \text{C}_8\text{H}_{18} \times \frac{1 \text{ mol } \text{C}_8\text{H}_{18}}{114.23 \text{ g } \text{C}_8\text{H}_{18}}$$? Keep three decimal places.

title: Identify the Stoichiometric Factor
text: The stoichiometric factor relating the two substances of interest is $$\frac{25 \text{ mol } O_2}{2 \text{ mol } C_8H_{18}}$$.

title: Calculate the Molar Amount of $$O_2$$
text: The molar amount of $$O_2$$ is derived by multiplying the provided molar amount of $$C_8 H_{18}$$ by the stoichiometric factor.

title: Calculate the Molar Amount of $$O_2$$
text: What is $$6.145 \text{ mol } \text{C}_8\text{H}_{18} \times \frac{25 \text{ mol } O_2}{2 \text{ mol } \text{C}_8\text{H}_{18}}$$? Keep three decimal places.

title: Calculate the Mass of $$O_2$$
text: Calculate the Mass of $$O_2$$ with $$\text{Mass of Reactant A} = \left(\frac{\text{Molar Mass of Reactant A}}{\text{Moles of Reactant A}}\right) \times \text{Moles of Reactant A}$$.

title: Calculate the Mass of $$O_2$$
text: What is $$76.819 \text{ mol } \text{O}_2 \times \frac{32.0 \text{ g } \text{O}_2}{1 \text{mol } \text{O}_2}$$? Give your answer in scientific notation.
